title: For Peace, More Ukrainians Consider the Once Unthinkable: Surrendering Land
summary_full: Polls show a growing acceptance of territorial concessions among a war-weary public, if Ukraine receives strong security guarantees.
summary_public: Polls show a growing acceptance of territorial concessions among a war-weary public, if Ukraine receives strong security guarantees.

UA.label: negative
UA.evidence: Surrendering Land Polls show a growing acceptance of territorial concessions
